cu.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
cu.explanation_en: Changing the remote SCTP control port to a mismatched value prevents connection to the DU's listening port, disrupting F1 interface setup.

du.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
du.explanation_en: Altering the local N address to an incorrect IP prevents proper F1 network interface binding and communication with the CU.
